2.panel_description: Provide weather forecast for Chicago from October 10th to October 15th.

1.handles: Retrieves weather forecast for Chicago for specified dates

input_vars.name: query_forecast_data
input_vars.description: Query to get weather forecast for Chicago from October 10th to October 15th
input_vars.value: Weather forecast for Chicago from October 10th to October 15th

output_vars.name: chicago_weather_forecast
output_vars.description: Weather forecast for Chicago for specified dates
